fullplot: Alicia Marnet de Ibèèez is a high school history professor and a well-to-do housewife in Buenos Aires, circa 1983, after the fall of the "junta militar" that had taken over the government since 1976. She has a husband, Roberto, who is a succesful lawyer and a five-year-old adopted daughter.
plot: After the end of the Dirty War, a high school teacher sets out to find out who the mother of her adopted daughter is.
title: The Official Story
